targets.rawSql:
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY pr_lead_time)
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-LEAST(initial_commit_date, shared_for_review_date))) AS pr_lead_time
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS lead_times
WHERE COALESCE(pr_lead_time, 0)>0

panels.title: Lead Time (from the first commit to pull request merge), $percentile

panels.description: From the first commit to PR raised

targets.rawSql:
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY development_time)
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)),0) AS development_time
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND pr.commits_history_was_rewritten=FALSE
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS timings

panels.title: Development time, $percentile

panels.description: From PR being raised to first comment/review/approval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY time_to_first_reaction)
FROM (
    SELECT
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0) AS time_to_first_reaction
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      AND first_reaction_date IS NOT NULL
    ) AS "First responses"
WHERE COALESCE(time_to_first_reaction, 0)>0

panels.title: Time to first reaction, $percentile

panels.description: Time from the first reaction to PR merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY rework_time)
FROM (
    SELECT
        GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)), 0) AS rework_time
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
      AND first_reaction_date IS NOT NULL
      AND rework_completed_date IS NOT NULL
) AS rework_times
WHERE COALESCE(rework_time, 0)>0

panels.title: Rework time, $percentile

panels.description: Time from last approve to PR merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY from_last_approval_to_merge)
FROM (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date)) AS from_last_approval_to_merge
    FROM (
            SELECT
                merged_date,
                GREATEST(pr.last_approval_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_commit_date) as last_action_date
            FROM pull_request AS pr
                INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.team_name = prtcpnt.team_name AND pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
                INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
            WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
                AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
                AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
                AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
                AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
                AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        ) AS approvals
) AS timings
WHERE COALESCE(from_last_approval_to_merge, 0)>0

panels.title: Idle between pull request approval and merge, $percentile

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(requested_reviewers_count) AS "Reviewers count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Comments count" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT AVG(diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as "Average PR size"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN tests_were_touched THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)::decimal/COUNT(*)*100 AS "PRs without tests touch" 
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT SUM(diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as "Total diff"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT 
    $__timeGroupAlias(start_date, $group_by_period), 
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.90) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY $display_flow_stats_for) AS "90th percentile",
    AVG(AVG($display_flow_stats_for)) OVER (ORDER BY $__timeGroup(start_date, $group_by_period, 0) 
                                ROWS BETWEEN 3 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS "Rolling Average",
    PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY $display_flow_stats_for) AS "Percentile of your choice",
    PERCENTILE_CONT(0.25) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY $display_flow_stats_for) AS "25th Percentile"

FROM 
   (SELECT 
      LEAST(initial_commit_date, shared_for_review_date) AS start_date,
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-LEAST(initial_commit_date, shared_for_review_date))) AS pr_lead_time,
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)) AS development_time,
      GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)), 0) AS time_to_first_reaction,
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)) AS rework_time,
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-GREATEST(pr.last_approval_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_commit_date))) AS idle_after_approve
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   ) AS timings
WHERE COALESCE($display_flow_stats_for, 0)>0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(start_date, $group_by_period, 0)

SELECT 
   $__timeGroupAlias(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period),
   COUNT(*) AS "PRs count",
   COUNT(DISTINCT pr.author_id) AS "Contributors count",
   AVG(requested_reviewers_count) AS "Average reviewers count",
   AVG(total_comments_count) AS "Average comments count",
   SUM(CASE WHEN tests_were_touched THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)::decimal/COUNT(*)*100 AS "PRs without tests changes",
   AVG(CASE WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted=0 THEN NULL ELSE diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted END) AS "Average diff size",
   SUM(diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as "Lines changed in period"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(shared_for_review_date, $group_by_period)

WITH pr_activity AS (
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
        END AS author_name,
        created_date,
        merged_date,
        generate_series(
            DATE_TRUNC('day', created_date), 
            DATE_TRUNC('day', merged_date), 
            '1 day'::interval
        ) AS activity_date
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
)

SELECT
    activity_date AS time,
    author_name AS value,
    COUNT(*)
FROM pr_activity
GROUP BY 1, 2
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Multitasking factor (amount of PRs author works on in parallel)

targets.rawSql:
WITH reviewer_demand AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN participant.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
        END AS reviewer_name,
        COUNT(prtcpnt.pull_request_number) AS added_as_reviewer,
        SUM(CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_comment_date IS NULL AND prtcpnt.first_approval_date IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS did_not_comment,
        SUM(CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_approval_date IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS did_not_approve
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt 
            ON pr.team_name = prtcpnt.team_name AND pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name 
            AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name 
            AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
        INNER JOIN actor AS author ON author.id = pr.author_id
        INNER JOIN actor AS participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY participant.nickname, participant.is_bot_user, participant.is_former_participant, participant.login
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= $min_prs_count_sample_size  -- Threshold for minimum PR participation

),
ranked_reviewers AS (
    SELECT 
        reviewer_name,
        added_as_reviewer,
        did_not_comment,
        did_not_approve,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY added_as_reviewer DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY added_as_reviewer ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM reviewer_demand
)
SELECT 
    reviewer_name,
    added_as_reviewer AS "Added as reviewer",
    did_not_comment AS "Did not comment",
    did_not_approve AS "Did not approve"
FROM ranked_reviewers
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "Added as reviewer" DESC;

panels.title: 10 Most Demanded vs. 10 Least Demanded Reviewers

targets.rawSql:
WITH reviewer_activity AS (
    SELECT 
        CASE 
            WHEN participant.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN participant.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(participant.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN participant.login ELSE participant.nickname END
        END AS reviewer_name,
        COUNT(*) AS pr_count,
        PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY prtcpnt.comments_count) AS comments_count,
        PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (prtcpnt.first_reaction_date - 
        CASE WHEN prtcpnt.first_reaction_date < shared_for_review_date THEN created_date ELSE shared_for_review_date END))) AS time_to_first_reaction
    FROM pull_request AS pr
    INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt 
        ON pr.team_name = prtcpnt.team_name AND pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name 
        AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name 
        AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    INNER JOIN actor AS participant ON participant.id = prtcpnt.participant_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
        AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
        AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
        AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
        AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
        AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT participant.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY participant.nickname, participant.is_bot_user, participant.is_former_participant, participant.login
    HAVING COUNT(*) >= $min_prs_count_sample_size  -- Threshold for minimum PR participation
),
ranked_reviewers AS (
    SELECT 
        reviewer_name,
        pr_count,
        comments_count,
        time_to_first_reaction,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY time_to_first_reaction DESC, comments_count DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY time_to_first_reaction ASC, comments_count ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM reviewer_activity
)
SELECT 
    reviewer_name,
    pr_count AS "PR Count",
    comments_count AS "Comments count",
    time_to_first_reaction AS "First reaction in"
FROM ranked_reviewers
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "First reaction in" ASC;

panels.title: 10 Most Active Reviewers vs. 10 Least Active Reviewers

targets.rawSql:
SELECT personal.repository_name, contributor_name, personal_contribution::numeric/total_contribution*100 as "contribution_percent"
FROM
    (SELECT 
        repository_name, 
        CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
        END AS contributor_name,
        SUM(diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as personal_contribution
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY repository_name, author.nickname, author.is_former_participant, author.is_bot_user, author.login) AS personal

RIGHT JOIN 
    (SELECT repository_name, SUM(diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as total_contribution
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY repository_name) AS total
ON total.repository_name=personal.repository_name
ORDER BY personal.repository_name

WITH review_timings AS (
SELECT 
  grouping_field AS "$group_by_field",
  PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-LEAST(COALESCE(initial_commit_date, shared_for_review_date), shared_for_review_date)))) AS total_lead_time,
  COUNT(*) AS prs_count,
  PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0)) AS development_time,
  PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS first_reaction_got_in,
  PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date))) AS rework_time,
  PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date))) AS idle_after_approve,


  PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0))
        +PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)))
        +PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)))
        +PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date))) AS "ordering_rank"
FROM (SELECT
        CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
          THEN
            CASE 
              WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
              WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
              ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
          ELSE pr.repository_name 
        END as grouping_field,
        pr.merged_date,
        pr.shared_for_review_date,
        CASE WHEN commits_history_was_rewritten THEN NULL ELSE pr.initial_commit_date END AS initial_commit_date,
        pr.first_reaction_date,
        pr.rework_completed_date,
        GREATEST(pr.last_approval_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_commit_date) as last_action_date
    FROM pull_request AS pr
        INNER JOIN pull_request_participant AS prtcpnt ON pr.team_name = prtcpnt.team_name AND pr.project_name = prtcpnt.project_name AND pr.repository_name = prtcpnt.repository_name AND pr.pull_request_number = prtcpnt.pull_request_number
        INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
    WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
    GROUP BY 1, pr.project_name, pr.repository_name, pr.pull_request_number, pr.merged_date, pr.shared_for_review_date, pr.commits_history_was_rewritten, pr.initial_commit_date, pr.first_reaction_date, pr.rework_completed_date, pr.last_approval_date, pr.last_commit_date
) AS activity_stats
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY GREATEST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (shared_for_review_date-initial_commit_date)), 0))
        +PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (first_reaction_date-shared_for_review_date)))
        +PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (rework_completed_date-first_reaction_date)))
        +PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-last_action_date)))
),
ranked_review_timings AS (
    SELECT 
        $group_by_field,
        total_lead_time,
        prs_count,
        development_time,
        first_reaction_got_in,
        rework_time,
        idle_after_approve,
        ordering_rank,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ordering_rank DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ordering_rank ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM review_timings
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
  $group_by_field,
  total_lead_time AS "Total lead time",
  prs_count AS "PRs count",
  development_time AS "Development time",
  first_reaction_got_in AS "First reaction got in",
  rework_time AS "Rework time",
  idle_after_approve AS "Idle after approve"
FROM ranked_review_timings
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY ordering_rank DESC;

WITH data AS (
   SELECT 
      CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
         THEN
            CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
         ELSE pr.repository_name 
      END as grouping_field,
      COUNT(*) as prs_count
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   GROUP BY 1
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        grouping_field,
        prs_count,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY prs_count DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY prs_count ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM data
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
 grouping_field AS "${group_by_field}",
 prs_count AS "PRs count"
FROM ranked_data
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY prs_count;

WITH data AS (
   SELECT 
      CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
         THEN
            CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
         ELSE pr.repository_name 
      END as grouping_field,
      SUM(diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as total_diff,
   COUNT(*) AS prs_count
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   GROUP BY 1
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        grouping_field,
        prs_count,
        total_diff,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY total_diff DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY total_diff ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM data
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
 grouping_field AS "${group_by_field}",
 total_diff AS "Total diff",
 prs_count AS "PRs count"
FROM ranked_data
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "Total diff";

WITH data AS (
   SELECT 
      CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
         THEN
            CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
         ELSE pr.repository_name 
      END as grouping_field,
      PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) as diff_size,
      COUNT(*) AS prs_count
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   GROUP BY 1
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        grouping_field,
        prs_count,
        diff_size,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY diff_size DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY diff_size ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM data
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
 grouping_field AS "${group_by_field}",
 diff_size AS "Diff size",
 prs_count AS "PRs count"
FROM ranked_data
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "Diff size";

WITH data AS (
   SELECT 
      CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
         THEN
            CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
         ELSE pr.repository_name 
      END as grouping_field,
      AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS approval_speed,
      COUNT(*) AS prs_count
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   GROUP BY 1
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        grouping_field,
        prs_count,
        approval_speed,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY approval_speed DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY approval_speed ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM data
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
 grouping_field AS "${group_by_field}",
 approval_speed AS "Approval speed",
 prs_count AS "PRs count"
FROM ranked_data
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "Approval speed";

WITH data AS (
   SELECT 
      CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
         THEN
            CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
         ELSE pr.repository_name 
      END as grouping_field,
      AVG(requested_reviewers_count) AS reviewers_count,
      COUNT(*) AS prs_count
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   GROUP BY 1
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        grouping_field,
        prs_count,
        reviewers_count,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reviewers_count DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reviewers_count ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM data
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
 grouping_field AS "${group_by_field}",
 reviewers_count AS "Reviewers count",
 prs_count AS "PRs count"
FROM ranked_data
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "Reviewers count";

WITH data AS (
   SELECT 
      CASE WHEN '$group_by_field'='author' 
         THEN
            CASE 
            WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
            WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
            ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
            END
         ELSE pr.repository_name 
      END as grouping_field,
      AVG(total_comments_count) AS comments_count,
      COUNT(*) AS prs_count
   FROM pull_request AS pr
      INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
   WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
      AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
      AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
      AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
      AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
      AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
      AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
   GROUP BY 1
),
ranked_data AS (
    SELECT 
        grouping_field,
        prs_count,
        comments_count,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY comments_count DESC) AS rank_desc,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY comments_count ASC) AS rank_asc
    FROM data
    WHERE prs_count>$min_prs_count_sample_size
)
SELECT 
 grouping_field AS "${group_by_field}",
 comments_count AS "Comments count",
 prs_count AS "PRs count"
FROM ranked_data
WHERE rank_desc <= $ranked_samples_size OR rank_asc <= $ranked_samples_size
ORDER BY "Comments count";

SELECT
   CASE
      WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted<500 THEN 100 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 100)
      WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted<5000 THEN 1000 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 1000)
      WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted<50000 THEN 10000 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 10000)
      ELSE 50000 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 50000)
   END as "Diff size",
   PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed",
   COUNT(*) AS "PRs count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Diff size"

SELECT
   requested_reviewers_count  AS "Reviewers count",
   PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (merged_date-shared_for_review_date))) AS "Approval speed",
   COUNT(*) AS "PRs count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY requested_reviewers_count
ORDER BY requested_reviewers_count

SELECT
   CASE
      WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted<500 THEN 100 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 100)
      WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted<5000 THEN 1000 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 1000)
      WHEN diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted<50000 THEN 10000 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 10000)
      ELSE 50000 * round((diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted) / 50000)
   END as "Diff size",
   PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_comments_count) AS "Comments count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND diff_rows_added+diff_rows_deleted!=0
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY "Diff size"

SELECT
   requested_reviewers_count  AS "Reviewers count",
   PERCENTILE_CONT($percentile) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY total_comments_count) AS "Comments count",
   COUNT(*) AS "PRs count"
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)
GROUP BY requested_reviewers_count
ORDER BY requested_reviewers_count

SELECT CONCAT(pr.project_name, '/', pr.repository_name, '/', pr.pull_request_number) as pull_request, pr.view_url, pr.integrity_errors
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE pr.integrity_errors IS NOT NULL
   AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

SELECT 
   pr.*, 
   CASE 
      WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
      WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
      ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
   END AS author
FROM pull_request AS pr
   INNER JOIN actor as author ON author.id = pr.author_id
WHERE $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
   AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pr.team_name IN ($team_name))
   AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR pr.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pr.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
   AND (COALESCE($pr_author) IS NULL OR author.id IN ($pr_author))
   AND ($include_bots_activities OR NOT author.is_bot_user)

panels.title: Raw Pull Requests including integrity errors

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT team_name 
FROM pull_request
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
ORDER BY team_name
list.label: Team
list.name: team_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT team_name 
FROM pull_request
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
ORDER BY team_name

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM pull_request 
WHERE 
    pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR team_name IN ($team_name))    
ORDER BY repository_name
list.label: Repository name
list.name: repository_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM pull_request 
WHERE 
    pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR team_name IN ($team_name))    
ORDER BY repository_name

list.definition:
SELECT 
DISTINCT author_role
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
list.description:
OWNER: the author is the owner of the repository.

 MEMBER: the author is a member of the organization that owns the repository.

 COLLABORATOR: the author has write access to the repository.

 FIRST_TIMER: the author is making their first contribution to any repository in the organization.

 FIRST_TIME_CONTRIBUTOR: the author is contributing to this particular repository for the first time.

 CONTRIBUTOR: the author has previously committed to the repository but is not necessarily a member or collaborator.

 MANNEQUIN: the author is a placeholder for a previously deleted user.

 NONE: the author has no affiliation with the repository.
list.label: Author role
list.name: pr_author_role
list.query:
SELECT 
DISTINCT author_role
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))

list.definition:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
author.id as __value, 
CASE 
    WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
    WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
    ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
END AS __text 
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
    AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pull_request.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
ORDER BY 2
list.label: PR author
list.name: pr_author
list.query:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
author.id as __value, 
CASE 
    WHEN author.is_former_participant THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (former participant)') 
    WHEN author.is_bot_user THEN CONCAT(author.login, ' (bot)')
    ELSE CASE WHEN $show_real_names THEN author.login ELSE author.nickname END
END AS __text 
FROM pull_request 
    INNER JOIN actor AS author ON pull_request.author_id = author.id
WHERE pull_request.integrity_errors IS NULL
    AND $__timeFilter(shared_for_review_date) 
    AND (COALESCE($team_name) IS NULL OR pull_request.team_name IN ($team_name))    
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
    AND (COALESCE($pr_author_role) IS NULL OR pull_request.author_role IN ($pr_author_role))
ORDER BY 2

list.label: Percentile
list.name: percentile
list.query: 50th percentile (mean) : 0.50, 75th percentile : 0.75, 90th percentile : 0.90, 95th percentile : 0.95, 99th percentile : 0.99, 100% values : 1

list.label: Display flow stats for
list.name: display_flow_stats_for
list.query: PR Lead time : pr_lead_time, Development time : development_time, Time to first reaction : time_to_first_reaction, Rework time : rework_time, Idle after approve : idle_after_approve
